summary: Play as the Lilmothiit in a balanced and lore friendly way.
descriptionHtml:
[b][color=#a61c00][size=6]Lilmotherious - Lilmothiit of Skyrim[/size][/color][/b]


[size=3]Lilmotherious introduces the Lilmothiit of Black Marsh to Skyrim as a playable race in a lore friendly way. Don't forget to endorse if you like it![/size]

[b][center][size=6]I have begun a mod that is going to add NPCs of my various races throughout Skyrim. [/size][size=6][color=#000000]If you would like to contribute to the project, either as a quest scripter, writer, or even a dungeon designer, send me a message![/color]
[b]You can find updates on the Zebsirious NPC Expansion as well as any of my other projects [url=https://zebsimods.blogspot.com/]here[/url]﻿![/b][/size][/center]
[color=#000000][size=5][center]This mod is out of date. An updated version can be found [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/88919]here[/url]﻿, as part of my Zebsirious race compilation.[/center][/size][/color][/b]
[color=#a61c00][size=5][b]Features[/b][/size][/color]

[list]
[*][size=3]A new playable race, the Lilmothiit[/size]
[*][size=3]Imperious-style stats and abilities[/size]
[/list]
[size=4][color=#a61c00][b]Lilmothiit skill bonuses[/b][/color]
[/size]
+10 Illusion
+10 Speech
+5 Alchemy
+5 Alteration
+5 One Handed
+5 Pickpocket

[size=4][color=#a61c00][b]Stats and abilities[/b][/color]

[/size]Health: 85
Magicka: 105
Stamina: 110
Health regeneration: 0.75%
Magicka regeneration: 3.125%
Stamina regeneration: 5.5%
Carry Weight: 275

[list]
[*][b]Flight Instinct[/b]: Stamina regeneration increases as health decreases.
[*][b]Limber[/b]: You have a small chance to avoid all damage from an incoming attack.
[*][b]Cunning[/b]: Prices are better, and persuasion attempts are easier.
[/list]
[color=#a61c00][b]Quest reward[/b] [b]- Discover 30 locations to unlock[/b][/color]
[b]Nomadic Sprint[/b]: [i]1/day [/i]- Run at an enhanced speed for 60 seconds.

[color=#a61c00][size=4][b]Requirements[/b][/size][/color]

[list]
[*][size=2]Skyrim[/size]
[*][size=2]Update 1.9[/size]
[*][size=2][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/10165]RacialCompatibility.esm[/url]﻿[/size]
[*][size=2][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/24168/?]RaceCompatibility for Skyrim and Dawnguard[/url]﻿ (overwrite the files in RacialCompatibility with TMPhoenix's files)[/size]
[/list]
[color=#a61c00][size=4][b]Compatibility

[/b][/size][/color]There shouldn't be any incompatibilities, but it's worth noting that any mods that edit khajiit (like Digitigrade Beast Races) might edit Lilmothiit as well.

[size=4][b][color=#a61c00]Permissions[/color][/b]
[/size]
As long as I am credited and notified, you may, without my permission:
[list]
[*][size=2]Upload translations of this mod[/size]
[*][size=2]Make compatibility patches for this mod[/size]
[*][size=2]Port this mod over to SSE[/size]
[/list]
If you'd like to use assets of this mod for any other reason, you must get my permission first. 

[b][color=#a61c00][size=4]Recommended[/size] [size=4]Mods[/size][/color][/b]

[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/87874]Dwemerious[/url] - My Imperious-esque Dwemer race mod
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/88418]Falmerious[/url] - My Imperious-esque Snow Elf race mod
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/88501]Maormerious[/url] - My Imperious-esque Maormer race mod

[color=#a61c00][size=4][b]Credits

[/b][/size][/color]EnaiSiaion for [size=2][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/61218]inspiration and a couple scripts
[/url][/size]Dreamcuphk for [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/62176/]original mod
[/url]expired6978 for [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/10165]RacialCompatibility[/url]
TMPhoenix for [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/24168/?]RaceCompatibility for Skyrim and Dawnguard[/url]
author: Zebsi
